languages.text: {n}Взгляды самых ретивых бойцов Комиссара недовольно вспыхивают, но большинство слишком раздавлено свалившимися на них новостями. Ваш переменчивый нрав не вызывает у них доверия, но больше им не на кого положиться.{/n}
{n}The eyes of the Commissar's most zealous fighters flare in displeasure, but most are too crushed by the news. Your fickle temper does not inspire trust, but they have no one else to rely on.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Взгляды самых ретивых бойцов Комиссара недовольно вспыхивают, но большинство слишком раздавлено свалившимися на них новостями. Ваш переменчивый нрав не вызывает у них доверия, но больше им не на кого положиться.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}The eyes of the Commissar's most zealous fighters flare in displeasure, but most are too crushed by the news. Your fickle temper does not inspire trust, but they have no one else to rely on.{/n}
traits.speaker: ImperialZealot_Melee_Prison

traits.speaker: ImperialZealot_Melee_Prison

traits.locale_text: {n}The eyes of the Commissar's most zealous fighters flare in displeasure, but most are too crushed by the news. Your fickle temper does not inspire trust, but they have no one else to rely on.{/n}
traits.speaker: ImperialZealot_Melee_Prison

languages.text: {n}政委那些最热忱的战士目光中闪烁着不满的光芒，但绝大部分人都被你的举动压垮了。你阴晴不定的脾气无法激起他们的信任，但他们也没有其他人可以依靠。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The eyes of the Commissar's most zealous fighters flare in displeasure, but most are too crushed by the news. Your fickle temper does not inspire trust, but they have no one else to rely on.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}政委那些最热忱的战士目光中闪烁着不满的光芒，但绝大部分人都被你的举动压垮了。你阴晴不定的脾气无法激起他们的信任，但他们也没有其他人可以依靠。{/n}
traits.speaker: ImperialZealot_Melee_Prison

languages.text: {n}Los ojos de los más fervorosos guerreros del comisario brillan, insatisfechos, pero las noticias aplastan sus ánimos. Aunque tu temperamento no inspira confianza, no tienen a nadie más a quien recurrir.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The eyes of the Commissar's most zealous fighters flare in displeasure, but most are too crushed by the news. Your fickle temper does not inspire trust, but they have no one else to rely on.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Los ojos de los más fervorosos guerreros del comisario brillan, insatisfechos, pero las noticias aplastan sus ánimos. Aunque tu temperamento no inspira confianza, no tienen a nadie más a quien recurrir.{/n}
traits.speaker: ImperialZealot_Melee_Prison

languages.text: {n}コミッサーの最も狂信的な戦士たちの眼差しは不快感に満ちている。だが、大半はその報せに気を挫かれている。あなたの気まぐれな性格は信頼できるものではないが、彼らには他に頼るものもないのだ。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The eyes of the Commissar's most zealous fighters flare in displeasure, but most are too crushed by the news. Your fickle temper does not inspire trust, but they have no one else to rely on.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}コミッサーの最も狂信的な戦士たちの眼差しは不快感に満ちている。だが、大半はその報せに気を挫かれている。あなたの気まぐれな性格は信頼できるものではないが、彼らには他に頼るものもないのだ。{/n}
traits.speaker: ImperialZealot_Melee_Prison

languages.text: {n}Vous lisez la désapprobation dans le regard des plus fidèles guerriers du commissaire, mais les autres sont trop ébranlés pour tenter quoi que ce soit. Bien que votre tempérament changeant ne leur inspire aucune confiance, ils savent qu'ils n'ont personne d'autre sur qui compter.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The eyes of the Commissar's most zealous fighters flare in displeasure, but most are too crushed by the news. Your fickle temper does not inspire trust, but they have no one else to rely on.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Vous lisez la désapprobation dans le regard des plus fidèles guerriers du commissaire, mais les autres sont trop ébranlés pour tenter quoi que ce soit. Bien que votre tempérament changeant ne leur inspire aucune confiance, ils savent qu'ils n'ont personne d'autre sur qui compter.{/n}
traits.speaker: ImperialZealot_Melee_Prison

languages.text: {n}Die Augen der leidenschaftlichsten Kämpfer des Kommissars flackern verärgert auf, doch die meisten sind zu niedergeschmettert von der Neuigkeit. Deine wankelmütigen Launen inspirieren kein Vertrauen, doch sie haben sonst niemanden, auf den sie sich verlassen könnten.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The eyes of the Commissar's most zealous fighters flare in displeasure, but most are too crushed by the news. Your fickle temper does not inspire trust, but they have no one else to rely on.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Die Augen der leidenschaftlichsten Kämpfer des Kommissars flackern verärgert auf, doch die meisten sind zu niedergeschmettert von der Neuigkeit. Deine wankelmütigen Launen inspirieren kein Vertrauen, doch sie haben sonst niemanden, auf den sie sich verlassen könnten.{/n}
traits.speaker: ImperialZealot_Melee_Prison

languages.text: {n}Komiser'in en hararetli savaşçılarından hoşnutsuz bakışlar alsan da çoğu, bu haberi alınca umutsuzluğa kapılıyor. Kararsız öfken onlara güven vermiyor ancak güvenebilecekleri başka kimse de yok.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The eyes of the Commissar's most zealous fighters flare in displeasure, but most are too crushed by the news. Your fickle temper does not inspire trust, but they have no one else to rely on.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Komiser'in en hararetli savaşçılarından hoşnutsuz bakışlar alsan da, çoğu bu haberi alınca umutsuzluğa kapılıyor. Kararsız öfken onlara güven vermese de, güvenebilecekleri başka kimse kalmamış.{/n}
traits.speaker: ImperialZealot_Melee_Prison
